metadata.title: CVE-2024-23659 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SPIP before 4.1.14 and 4.2.x before 4.2.8 allows XSS via the name of anuploaded file. This is related to javascript/bigup.js andjavascript/bigup.utils.js.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
